paragraphs: Starting my programming journey in middle school with HTML, I was amazed by the ability to create web pages from scratch. In high school, I joined the Information Science Club and discovered the joy of team development. At university, I chose Information Science to study both theoretical computer science and practical development skills.

With the belief that 'Technology is a bridge connecting people,' I always value the end-user perspective. I aim to create better products through team collaboration, incorporating Agile development and design thinking methodologies.
